name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Ralph BRACERO, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Ralph BRACERO, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
The petition for allowance of appeal having been improvidently granted, the appeal is dismissed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Joel M. Breitstein, Lebanon, for appellant.
David M. Brightbill, Dist. Atty., Thomas S. Long, Asst. Dist. Atty., Wm. Thurston, Lebanon, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
415 A.2d 412
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Ralph BRACERO, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 18, 1980.
Joel M. Breitstein, Lebanon, for appellant.
David M. Brightbill, Dist. Atty., Thomas S. Long, Asst. Dist. Atty., Wm. Thurston, Lebanon, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
